settings.featured_text: Zero paint. Zero dry time. Zero disappointments. Get stunning nail art in minutes with our vegan, non-toxic nail wraps.
Did you know that the average babe gets a mani 2x a month? Now you can have 3 manis delivered right to your door every month.

settings.featured_title: At Paintbucket, we know what it takes to live in New York
settings.featured_text: So we give our best to the women who do. With high-quality services in an obsessively clean environment, we’re a place where you can bring a friend, or make some more. Where you can buff away the past week, and face the next one feeling shiny and new. And we’re exactly where you want to be.
Explore the people and local neighborhood treasures that inspire us on the daily. With a mix of NYC round ups, artist interviews and product reviews, there’s always something new to discover.

settings.announcement_text: SHOP OUR AWARD WINNING PRESS ONS HERE.

settings.copyright_text: Paintbucket | Site by Shoppe Theory | Privacy Policy

settings.heading: Restock & refresh
settings.text: Fall is around the corner and we’re dreaming of sweet subtle neutrals inspired by falling leaves and cozy spiced drinks.

settings.heading: Inside The Bucket
settings.subtitle:
Explore the people and local neighborhood treasures that inspire us on the daily.
With a mix of NYC round ups, self-care tips and lifestyle hacks, there’s always something new to discover.

settings.look_text: Summer is swooping in and we’re packing our bags faster than you can say “arrivederci”. This collection of sultry-hued manis is made for the babe jetsetting overseas to visit her favorite cliff-adorned beach clubs. From sleek white curves to art-deco accents, this collection will have you singing amore, all season long.

A mani made of the simplest pleasure in life, the perfect hue of blue. Inspired by the dazzling coastal town of Positano, this surreal design is made for the wanderlust traveler in all of us. From climbing floral-enchanted staircases to gliding your fingertips across the deep blue sea, this mani is inspired by all of the little moments we love to embrace while on holiday.

This mani is what you vacation for. Inspired by the rocky pockets of gilded beaches + chic umbrellas along the southern Italian coast, this design harmoniously blends the gorgeous shades of Italian sand and stone that make up the picturesque beach days we yearn for.

For the effortlessly chic, this minimal mani is inspired by late-night dinners on Via Corce on the island of Capri. A simple, statement mani that shines as you sip a glass of bubbly while watching linen-drenched models make their way to and from the high-end boutique at the end of the cobblestone street.

When the sun starts to shine, you start to bloom. Our latest nail wrap collab with Anthropologie celebrates the beauty that surrounds us. Hand painted by the talented Juliet Meeks, this collection of vibrant florals and blush hues is everything you need to embrace Spring in full swing.
Soiree, not sorry. Did someone call for a mani made for the party of their dreams? Don this pink-hued and floral-studded mani to any event and wait for the all the gushing and adoration to come.

Sweet dreams are made of these. We know you’ve been wishing for the perfect floral mani and this one puts all your worries at ease. The delicate pink poppies and subtle green stems are not only dainty but trendy, all at once.

There is nothing quite as hopeful as lush florals in spring. When we see them bloom, we become anew. Get back into the sweeter side of the seasons with this rose stacked mani…so flirty and sweet it’s bound to make you blush.
The most romantic time of year calls for the most swoon worthy manis, and we’ve got cupid’s arrow. Featuring dainty hearts and chic patterns, this collection is bound to make you fall in love.

Get ready to fall for this mani, big time. A gorgeous baby blue base, contrasted with an on-trend tan that’s highlighted with white lines and perfectly placed hearts. Did someone say love at first sight?

It doesn't get better than this crush worthy design. With latte swirls on a clean white backdrop, made even cuter with perfectly minimal heart accents, we wouldn't be shocked if this became a go-to way past February 14th.

Check and (soul)mate. We’re not playing games when we say this is the ultimate mani for the most love filled day of the year. This rosey-hued glitter and white checkered pattern scattered with mini hearts will have you obsessed, all season long.
Think cowboy boots, saloons and sparkly spurs. With western inspired prints in luxe autumnal shades, this collection is bound to stirrup more than just that small town buzz.

Your “most wanted” mani for fall is here. Black, white, and maroon shades all come together to create the perfect paisley printed design. Because who said bandanas were only for covering up your face?
Say howdy to your new favorite cow print mani. Featuring this seasons trendiest design in a deep maroon shade with a bright white base, this look is worth being on the run for.

Bring the best of spooky season to your fingertips with entrancing celestial details and starry midnight swirls. Our latest collection of luminous nail wraps will have you head over heels all autumn long.

Light and eerie all at once, The Celestial Eclipse Mani has everything you need to get through the most mystical time of year. With its understated crescent moons, peachy hue and transparent base, people won't be able to take their eyes off of this otherworldly mani.

Think starry skies and cool autumn air. The Interstellar Glow Mani features delicate golden moons and stars on top of a midnight grey base with a transparent swirl. This minimalistic and perfectly spooky look will have you shining all season long.

Chic, simple, and fresh, the New Moon mani is the perfect way to bring the best of spooky season right to your fingertips. With a two toned black and transparent base, featuring crescent moon detailing this mani will be a must for October and beyond.
Hot desert sun, rocky mountains, and burnt orange hues, the Desert Dreams collection is the ultimate way to channel some of nature's most fabulous creations.

The combination of sunny orange and pale yellow mimics the beautiful sunsets between the rocky red mountains. These two shades together will add a golden glow to your nail bed that people won’t be able to take their eyes off of.
Soothing streams and babbling brooks, the Slickrock mani channels the desert’s most refreshing spots. With its stunning shades of orange and teal, it’s sure to make a splash.

The Sunrise Point mani features two toned orange shades separated by a dreamy teal. Reminiscent of bold rock formations with calming rivers, this mani will leave you yearning for an adventure filled vaca.
Beach sunsets, nature walks and sunny skies. Our summer nail wrap collection is the perfect way to bring your boho dreams to life.

Bring out your inner nature lover with The Willow Mani. Stunning green, blue and purple shades will bring the outdoors right to your finger tips, and it's tie dye pattern will give you that ultimate summer feeling.
The Celeste Mani is bright, elegant and (just like it's name) heavenly. This mani is the ultimate way to bring the sunshine of summer right on to your nails.
The down to earth Sierra Mani captures the feeling of being light, grounded and sunkissed. With bright pink and coral shades in a playful tie dye pattern this is the perfect mani to ring in summer.
Spring into our new collection of nail wraps, inspired by dreamy sunsets, luxe picnics, and fields of fleur. Welcome to our louvre-ly secret garden party!
No mistake about it, this wildflower mani is flawless. Inspired by billowy embroidered skirts, your fingertips will flourish with florets.
A watercolor translation of a breezy vineyard. Oh, the places you’ll go with this super fine brush stroke mani.
Warning, this sunrise nail wrap may cause wanderlust. Dreamy ombré vibes are exactly what you need to help you (cherry) blossom this season.

Seersucker stripes with a gold edge trim, oh my. This airy yet buttoned-up mani fits all, and brings structure to any off-the-cuff rendezvous. So fill up your finest charcuterie boards, and don’t forget to bring a bottle opener. ;)
Now serving the sweetest of fruit manis. With no pulpy mess. This mani will kick start any tea party convo with hand-painted pinkies out. *clink*
Chambray lining: check. Golden wicker handle: check. As many cheeses you can possibly fit: check. This is our love letter to that very specific pique-nique vessel, you know the one!
Inspired by lady leaders from the 60s, this collection features strikingly bold colors and gorgeous patterns that will make you marvel at your own nails.

Genius has no race. Strength has no gender. Fabulous has no color. This solid, bright aqua is pushing its way to the top of our favorites and no one is mad about it. Similarly to how Katherine Goble Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan, and Mary Jackson made their way to the top at NASA during the Space Race. We stan.

The soft strokes of baby pink are smooth as butter, or better yet, smooth as Odetta Holmes’ songs. Odetta was the voice of the Civil Rights Movement and this nail wrap is the voice of your fingertips!

Be an undercover Playboy Bunny with this Gloria Steinman inspired wrap. With a touch of baby pink and a fiery finish, you can hit every note that is Femme Fatale. You don’t work for them, they work for YOU, baby!

Complex, chaotic, yet extremely easy on the eyes. This palette of deep, rich colors works harmoniously together. Betty Friedan was able to put millions of women’s feelings into words during the 60s feminist movement, and PaintBucket was able to put millions of splish splashes onto your nailbeds.

This Joan Holloway inspired wrap is for the taste makers. A dusted coral bed with a soft lemongrass scribble reminds you, every time you look down at your nails, that you don’t need perfect lines for absolute perfection.

Be bold. Be badass. Be… Helen Gurley Brown. This Helen-inspired wrap was born to embody the self-made, supremely ambitious, and painstakingly fabulous person under the nail wrap. It’s subtle, yet chaotic. It’s sexy, yet messy. It’s… your new favorite accent pattern?
Channel your solar plexus with this bright, glittery, god-tier glamour. Radiate confidence and motivate yourself to be nothing short of great. It all starts with a nice manicure.
With electric bubblegum energy, dreamy rosé lightning bolts and rock candy kisses, what's not to L-O-V-E?

Ring ring! Get the perfect mani at home with the Electric Rosé nail wrap kit. Speed dial your self care routine with this rosy pattern carbonated with crisp lightning bolt details. So you can fill in your girl gang on the latest hot goss.
Big! Pastel! Energy! Sugar rush into self care with this effortlessly luxe, confectionery number.
Let your nails make a statement with this conversation-starter: these candy lips were made for talking, and that’s just what they’ll do.
Inspired by the OG smiley emoji, the Candy Necklace nail wrap kit is our fav kind of happy go lucky throwback. With pastel polka dot happy faces, it’s easy to spread the posi vibes!
Zap into this white-hot nail wrap topped with electric technicolor sprinkles, ready for any adrenaline rush or a recharging night in.
A collection of clear and sheer based nail wraps, meticulously accented with thoughtfully weighted white lines.
Traffic jams are messy but the lines on our mani shouldn’t be. The Gridlock mani is a minimalistic design with a clear base and delicate thin, white lines that might cause you to stop in your tracks.
Coordinates? How do you use those? A pre-Google Maps inspired mani that highlights the beauty of latitude and longitude, laid over a baby blue sea.
A mani designed with a gorgeous sheer blush base and lightly weighted white lines that will leave you feeling like you’ve just wandered off to a luscious escape.

A design that commands attention in a down to earth type of way. Created with gorgeous white lines, meticulously measured against a gorgeous deep green hue, this mani subtly exudes all things “supreme-being”.
This season, we're thankful for the simple and elegant things – like moon swoops and creamy pastels.
The only thing better than a sleek nude, is a sleek blush. With a hint of white at the base of the nail, this design is what a french manicure’s dreams are made of.
Featuring a buttery yellow hue, this 1920s inspired design naturally elongates the nail.  Cozy on up with a sidecar and let these half moons perfectly compliment your favorite chunky sweater.

Designed by Breana Johnson, this collection celebrates the exquisite and diverse facial features of women from around the globe, while giving back to local communities in NYC.

Learn more about the inspiration behind the collection here.

The simple black details on sleek neutrals elongates the nail and alludes to your appreciation for the softer things in life. Named after Breana’s late mother, Vera, this design puts an artistic twist on an always classic.

Named after the artist behind this collection, The Breana mani makes a modern statement with black swirls and abstracted facial features. Warning: you may find yourself gazing at the intricate artistry of your nails throughout the day.

Garnett, blurs nature with feminine mystique. The Garnett is named after Garnett Phillip, a loyal Paintbucket babe since day 1. This glossy pale nude is already clocked as trending for summer into fall, and the delicate black and white details take it to another level.
Say “bon dia” to designs inspired by Barcelona’s most iconic architecture.
Turn heads with this iconic look inspired by one of Antoni Gaudí's most innovative pieces of work.
A mani inspired by a true masterpiece. The Casa Batlló will have you feeling like your strutting down the Passeig de Gràcia in the heart of Barcelona.

settings.intro_text: Forget the Met, we like our art right where we can see it. Get our seasonal nail art looks painted at our shop or have them delivered right to your door with our easy application nail wraps.
settings.closing_text: Get these looks at home in just minutes.

settings.closing_text:
Paintbucket is the perfect place to celebrate, for anyone from birthday girls to brides-to-be. Snacks can be arranged (and are highly encouraged).

To plan your Paintbucket party, send us an e-mail at: hello@paintbucketnails.com

settings.title: Tell me a bit more about the services at Paintbucket.
settings.answer: We offer a wide variety of treatments performed by some of the most talented technicians and nail artists in the industry. We provide everything from organic and all-natural treatments to gel services and nail extensions. If you’re interested in nail art, check out our curated Lookbook or bring us a custom design.

settings.title: What kinds of products does Paintbucket use?
settings.answer: We’re committed to using the most ethical, effective and when possible, natural products on the market. We offer a range of lacquers from basic (Essie, OPI, Flossgloss) to luxury if you’re feeling fancy (Deborah Lippman, Smith & Cult, Chanel and Givenchy). And since we’re big fans of Mother Earth, we do our best to only use 5, 7 and 9 free lacquers, and our creams and oils are natural or organic when possible.

settings.title: I’m a germaphobe.
settings.answer:
That wasn’t really a question, but we get it. We thoroughly disinfect, clean and sterilize every tool and piece of equipment in a medical grade autoclave. We use tankless pedicure bowls with state-of-the-art purification systems that are engaged after every use.

That being said, if you’d prefer not to share manicure tools, we offer personal toolkits for purchase. Each kit includes a personal cuticle nipper, nail clipper and cuticle pusher. We’ll even hold onto it for you at the shop. And since your cuticles are the only things keeping the outside outside of your nailbeds, we nip minimally while making sure every finger gets the attention it needs.

settings.title: I’ve been reading a lot about unfair labor practices in nail salons. Is Paintbucket different?
settings.answer: At Paintbucket, we strive to lead the nail industry by example. Our licensed technicians are essential members of the Paintbucket team and work six-eight hour shifts with higher than average payment structures based on their industry day rate. And since we’re a small business, we select product and design partners from other small, local businesses whenever possible. Love thy neighbor, you know? If you have any questions about how we do things, send us an e-mail at hello@paintbucketnails.com.

settings.title: What’s the deal with cancellations?
settings.answer:
We do our best to stay on schedule at Paintbucket because we know all of you babes want to enjoy your service at the time you booked it for. In an effort to keep things on track, we have a strict cancellation policy, which protects both your time and ours.

Individual Cancellations/No Shows: If you need to cancel your appointment, please contact us by 9 PM the night before your appointment. If you do not cancel within that time frame, you will be charged 50 percent of your scheduled service cost. If you do not cancel and do not show up to your appointment, you will be charged the full cost of your service.

Group Cancellations/No Shows: For parties of three or more, please let us know if you need to cancel or reschedule your appointments at least 48 hours in advance. Groups of three or more that do not show up without cancelling in advance will be charged the full price of all services originally scheduled.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
All gift card purchases are final sale. All merchandise bought in store can be exchanged for store credit only and must be unopened and unused. Returns must be made within 15 days of purchase.

We do not offer refunds on any services.

settings.title: What if my nails chip?
settings.answer:
If for some reason, your gel mani chips within 7 days of your service, we are happy to provide a complimentary gel fix to the nails that have chipped. The gel color must be the same as the color you received during your original service and we can only fix the nails that have chipped. We kindly request that you email us a picture of your chipped mani at hello@paintbucketnails.com or come into the shop to show us.

**Chipping complaints 7+ days after any service will not be acknowledged.**

settings.title: Have a question we didn’t answer?
settings.answer: Don’t hesitate to email us at hello@paintbucketnails.com.

settings.title: Your salon should be as cool as you are
settings.text:
Picture this: A comfortable-yet-curated space. A #girlcrushworthy staff.

Free. Prosecco. 🥂 And tons of polish & nail art options because we were never really into the whole

“less is more” thing.

settings.subtitle_one: Same. So we made it easy to book appointments and choose your nail technician from anywhere with service.
settings.subtitle_two: We’re dedicated to providing an obsessively clean and safe environment. If you share our obsession, we have personal toolkits available for purchase. Sometimes it’s nice not having to share.

settings.heading: EVERY GIRL NEEDS HER GANG
settings.subtitle: And we want to meet yours. Bring your girlfriends to Paintbucket, or meet some new ones while you’re here. Think of us as a social club for the 21st century, but with less corsets. Unless you’re not in the mood to socialize. We get it. Quiet time is important too.

settings.title: MEET KRISTIN
settings.text:
She’s always believed that the best accessory is a perfectly polished pair of hands (and toes, naturally). But the salon experience in NYC was never quite what she needed. After working long hours at her desk everyday, Kristin’s idea of indulging wasn’t sitting under harsh lights while breathing in harsher fumes. And she didn’t want to blow her hard-earned paycheck at one of those fancy places either.

So she left her career in advertising for something a little bigger and a lot more personal: a self-owned and operated nail shop that caters to clients just like her. Enter Paintbucket, a place for working women who spend their 9-5 girl-bossing their way through a man’s world.

settings.intro_subtitle: Don’t you think it’s time your nail salon got a makeover? That’s where we come in. We’re Paintbucket, a modern nail shop in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
settings.intro_text: But we’re more than just manicures. We’re in the business of recognizing our clients’ achievements and rewarding them with the simple act of feeling good.

settings.text:
We know what it takes to live in this city.
So we’re giving our best to the women who do.
settings.title: Membership Perks Include
settings.perk_text_two: Free nail art during your birthday month
settings.perk_text_three:
Access to appointments
up to 3 weeks in advance
settings.perk_text_six: A members only keyring for discounts with our local partners
settings.perk_text_seven:
Skip our daily waitlist 
with priority booking

settings.step_one: Choose the membership level that suits you the best
settings.step_two: Sign up at our shop or online
settings.step_three: Grab your Broad Strokes keyring and toolkit when you visit us for your first member appointment
settings.step_four: Flash your keyring at any of our local partners and receive savings galore
settings.step_five: Enjoy all of the perks of being a Broad Strokes member!

settings.title: Broadly Speaking, You Look Like A Woman Who Likes to Save $$
settings.text: Flash your Broad Strokes keyring at any of our neighborhood partners and save a ton.
settings.partner_desc_one: Become a regular at a different kind of bar and save 10% on all classes at Bar Method Williamsburg. Your wallet (and abs) will thank you.
settings.partner_desc_two: If home is where the heart is, consider Leif essential for your cardiac health. Save 10% on homegoods like pillows, planters, candles and other stuff that’s guaranteed to spark joy.
settings.partner_desc_three: Combining cardio, strength training and Pilates, working out at SLT is tough–but then again so are you. Get your first class for free and enjoy 15% off five and ten-pack classes after that.
settings.partner_desc_four: Homecoming is making life in the city more beautiful, one Brooklynite at a time. Save 10% on their floral services, quirky home goods, do-it-yourself workshops and more.
settings.partner_desc_five: Brightside is our favorite Australian export since the Hemsworth brothers. Say “good morning” and actually mean it when you save 10% on all Brightside coffee products.
settings.partner_desc_six: Coffee, cocktails and yes, corn hole. Freehold has the best of Brooklyn in one place. Save 10% on food, drinks, and private events (+ skip the line anytime).
settings.partner_desc_seven: Bikini waxes will never be fun, but Shobha gets pretty damn close. Get 15% off threading, waxing and laser hair removal, all administered by gentle technicians in a sparkling clean and comfy space.
settings.partner_desc_eight: Trust your bobs, lobs and layers to the stylists at Rob Peetoom. Save 10% on cuts, colors and other services inspired by you—not trends.
settings.partner_desc_nine: Clean Beauty Quyen doesn’t just believe in eating her greens—she’ll put them on your face. Save 10% on her all-natural, plant-based skin services for a Goop-approved glow.

settings.option_includes_one:
2 basic manis

1 basic pedi per month
settings.option_includes_two:
2 basic manis + gel

1 basic pedi per month

*free gel removals
settings.fine_print: Mandatory Restrictions - Commitment: Members must sign up for a 3 month minimum. Use: Memberships are non-transferable and can only be used by the member. Membership fees cannot be returned or used for other services. Cancellation: Memberships must be cancelled 30 days in advance of the next billing cycle by emailing hello@paintbucketnails.com, memberships cannot be cancelled until after the 3 month minimum.

Discounts • VIP access • savings & more

settings.heading: HOW IT WORKS
settings.subtitle: Easier than catching the bouquet. Safer too.
settings.col_one_subtitle: Fill out the form below. We’ll give you a call within 24 hours to chat about your designs.
settings.col_two_subtitle: We’ll create 3 custom designs for you to choose from. Mix them, match them; keep what you love and change what you don’t.
settings.col_three_subtitle: Book your service and see your final designs come to life.

settings.heading: PRICING
settings.body:
BASE PRICE (DOES NOT INCLUDE SERVICE): $140

Includes three custom designs. Every additional design is $25 each.

SERVICE PRICE: ≈$85 PER SERVICE

The cost of service will vary according to the complexity of the designs, but we’ll always give you a quote prior to your appointment.

settings.heading: THAT RING’S GONNA HAVE SOME COMPETITION
FAQ
settings.body:
What do I get?

Every purchase includes three custom designs inspired by your wedding colors, location and personal preference. Additional designs are $25 each.

How do I know I’ll find a design I love?

Collaboration is 🔑. We’ll work with you closely to identify your budget, likes & dislikes, plus your personal wedding style. Send us swatches, moodboards, whatever your heart desires!

What if I’m not feeling my designs?

Every purchase includes one round of revisions. After your first round of feedback, additional charges may be incurred.

settings.heading: GET STARTED
settings.subtitle: Fill out this form and we’ll give you a call in the next 24 hours!

settings.intro_text: You’ve got the dream dress--now get the dream mani. Work with our nail artists to create three custom designs for you and your bridal party. Because wedding couture isn’t just for dresses anymore.

settings.heading: A heart to haart with Batsheva
settings.subtitle: Breaking hearts, not nails is our mantra when it comes to our very first press-on collection with Batsheva Haart. We sat with the My Unorthodox Life's "it-girl" to get to know a little bit more about her love for nails and what inspires her everyday.

settings.heading: Monthly Mani Club
settings.subtitle: Think of it as a book club… but for your nails. Subscribe to our Monthly Mani Club and get 3 nail wrap kits delivered each month.
settings.sublink_note: Actual nail wrap designs will vary by month based on new releases.

settings.title: How it works
settings.subheading: Your mailman, just became your nailman (or woman 😉)
settings.col_one_subtitle:
You choose what works best for you. 
Sign up for 1, 3, 6 or 12 months. The longer you commit, the more you save.
settings.col_two_subtitle:
Ah, the joy of a new package! 
It’s the beginning of the month and you’ve just received 3 of our latest nail wrap kits.
settings.col_three_subtitle: Each month, we’ll release 3 video tutorials on our IGTV. Subscribe to find out when they go LIVE.

settings.title: Instant heart eyes
settings.text:
Each monthly mani package is bundled with love and includes:

  • 3 Nail wrap kits
    Each manicure is made up of 20, 100% polish nail wraps
  • 3 Mini nail files
Want to gift a Monthly Mani Club subscription? Best. gift. ever.
Did you receive a Gift Subscription? Time to treat yourself.

settings.title: Join the Monthly Mani Club
settings.subtitle: The more you commit, the more you save. Choose the plan that works best for you.

settings.title: What comes in my monthly mani club package?
settings.answer: Each month you’ll receive 3 nail wrap kits. Each kit includes 20 100% polish nail wraps and a disposable file.

settings.title: What if I move?
settings.answer: Simply go into your account page and update your shipping address

settings.title: Can I choose my designs?
settings.answer: Not yet. Right now, you’ll be the first to receive our latest and greatest nail wraps each month. Some months will be solid colors, while others will be fun nail art. All of our wraps are meticulously designed with all of our customers in mind.

settings.title: How is my subscription billed?
settings.answer: Your subscription is billed at time of purchase. After your first package arrives, you will be billed on the 1st of each month following that (for 1 month subscriptions on auto-bill). For all 3, 6 and 12 month pre-paid subscriptions, billing will occur at the time of your initial purchase and occur again on the 1st of the month, following the date that your pre-paid subscription is set to expire.

settings.title: How do refunds work?
settings.answer: We don’t offer refunds but if for some reason, you aren’t 100% happy with your nail wraps, simply let us know by emailing orders@paintbucketnails.com. We’ll do what we can to make sure you’re 100% happy.

settings.title: Can I cancel my subscription?
settings.answer:
Month-to-Month Subscriptions (without term commitment) can be canceled at any time in your Account Settings using the "Manage Subscription" link in the footer. If you’ve already been billed for this month’s box, your cancellation will take effect in the next billing cycle. 

3, 6 or 12-Month Subscription Plans (with term commitment) cannot be canceled mid-term. You are able to opt-out of auto-renewal within your Account Settings or by reaching out to order@paintbucketnails.com.

Paintbucket Subscription Plans cannot be paused and monthly packages cannot be skipped at this time.

settings.title: When will my monthly mani package arrive each month?
settings.answer: All monthly mani packages will be shipped out on the first week of each month. You should expect to receive your package within 3-5 days via USPS.

settings.title: When will the Monthly Mani Club tutorials on IGTV take place?
settings.answer: Tune into our instagram @paintbucketnails for monthly calendars of when IGTV tutorials will be released & for more details regarding special event IG LIVES.

settings.title: Subscription Box FAQs
settings.sub_button_text: Have more questions? Email us at hello@paintbucketnails.com

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/492253243?autoplay=1&loop=1&background=1" width="500" height="500" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
settings.heading: Clean & Clear
settings.subtitle: Wash hands with soap and water to remove dirt and oil.
settings.pro_tips:
• Wipe your nails with alcohol or acetone for extra staying power.
  • More oil means less staying power.
  • Avoid lotions prior to your pamper.

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/492253219?autoplay=1&loop=1&background=1" width="500" height="500" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
settings.heading: Place & Press
settings.subtitle: Peel and place nail wrap 1mm below the cuticle
settings.pro_tips:
• Gently push back cuticles and smooth out your wrap.
  • Make sure the wrap isn't touching your skin! It’s better to size down when placing you wrap and stretching it to fit vs going too big.
  • Make sure the edges are really pressed down and have fully adhered to your natural nail.

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/492253223?autoplay=1&loop=1&background=1" width="500" height="500" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
settings.heading: Fold & File
settings.subtitle: Fold nail wrap over the edge of the nail and file away excess.
settings.pro_tips:
• Avoid filing on top of the nail wrap, focus on filing underneath the free edge of the nail.
  • Filing too straight on vs underneath the nail can cause some of the design to be buffered away.

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/492253312?autoplay=1&loop=1&background=1" width="500" height="500" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
settings.heading: Top or Not
settings.subtitle: For extra staying power, add a top coat (or you can go leave it bare).
settings.pro_tips:
• Try to avoid a quick-dry top coat. It can cause the wrap to shrink.
  • We can apply gel at our shop for even longer wear.
  • Top coat adds extra protection.

settings.intro_text:
HOW TO APPLY #PBWRAPS LIKE A PRO

We reimagined DIY nail care so that babes across the nation could have access to our obsessed-about nail art while at home. Here are all of the tips and tricks to prepping your nails, applying our wraps and removing them safely. Now lets get wrapping, you talented artist, you.
settings.heading: How to apply
settings.remove_content: Simply remove PB wraps with acetone or oil.
settings.closing_content: Have ‘em wrapped around your finger in minutes.

settings.title: 7-10 Days of Wear. Lasts longer than a summer fling.
Vegan & Cruelty-Free. Kindness is never wasted.
100% Polish without the smudging or dry time
Easy to Remove. Just use some oil or acetone.
Once Upon A Pastel Moon Collection

settings.heading: Our Collections
settings.content: Our high-design collections are created by our talented team of artists from our shop in Brooklyn, NY. We pull inspiration from everything around us and tell magical stories through the art we create.

settings.title: How long do PB nail wraps last?
settings.answer: Our nail wraps last anywhere from 7-10 days. If applied with gel, our nail wraps can last about two weeks.

settings.title: How do I know what size wrap is best for my nails?
settings.answer: You can select your wrap size by placing the full sheet of wraps over your nails (with the curved end up towards your cuticle). The right fit will cover your natural nail but will not touch your skin. We suggest using a wrap slightly smaller than your nail, then gently stretching it so that it lies completely flat on your nail with no air bubbles or lifting.

settings.title: What if my nail is too big or too small for some of the nail wraps?
settings.answer: If some nail wraps don't fit your nails perfectly, you should size down and then gently stretch the wrap to perfectly fit your nail. We recommend using a wrap that is slightly smaller than your nail to avoid the wrap touching skin or cuticles. Using a wrap that is too large and ultimately touches your skin, will cause lifting at the edges.

settings.title: Are PB nail wraps safe?
settings.answer: Yes, our nail wraps are SGS and MSDS certified. If you have any allergic reactions to nail polishes do not use this product. Our nail wraps are safe to use if pregnant and are 7 chemical-free.

settings.title: Are PB nail wraps tested on animals?
settings.answer: No animal testing has been performed on our nail wraps. Our nail wraps are also leaping bunny certified.

settings.title: Are PB nail wraps waterproof?
settings.answer: Yes. Our nail wraps are waterproof if they are applied correctly. You do not have to apply a base coat but applying a top coat will make the wraps last longer and protect from any oils or dirt getting underneath the wraps.

settings.title: How do I remove PB nail wraps?
settings.answer: Our nail wraps can be easily removed with nail polish remover or oil.

settings.title: Can PB nail wraps be shipped to Canada or outside of the US?
settings.answer: We do not currently ship to Canada or internationally.

Plus, you'll get tons of perks like free gel removals and 10% off nail art and retail products at our shop. Check out all of the different ways you can save below.
settings.closing_content: All packages can be purchased in store. Packages are for one guest only and cannot be shared. All packages expire 6 months after the purchase date. There are no refunds or returns on package purchases.

settings.title: Do packages expire?
settings.answer: Yes, all packages expired 6 months after the purchase date.

settings.title: Can I share my package with a friend or family member?
settings.answer: No, packages can only be used by the individual that purchased the package. If you are purchasing a package for someone, it will be added to their customer profile on the day of purchase.

settings.title: Can I substitute different services with the same value for the services in my package?
settings.answer: No, you can only use the services that are specified in your package.

settings.title: Can I cancel my package?
settings.answer: Packages are non-refundable and cannot be used after the expiration date.

  • More oil means less staying power.

settings.heading: Size & Organize
settings.subtitle: Size PB Press Ons by holding each tip over your natural nail and selecting the size that fits best without touching surrounding skin.
settings.pro_tips:
• Can’t find the perfect match? Size up and file down the sides of the nail until it lays on top of your nail bed perfectly.
  • Make sure the press on is not touching the skin or it will lift sooner than expected.
  • Align your tips in order from left to right so you can easily remember which tip goes on which nail.
settings.subtitle2: Wash hands with soap and water to remove dirt and oil.
settings.pro_tips2:
• Add pro tips here
  • Add pro tips here
  • Add pro tips here

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/767039545?autoplay=1&loop=1&background=1" width="640" height="562" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
settings.heading: Using Glue
settings.subtitle: Apply glue to your natural nail and the back of your PB Press Ons. Align PB Press Ons just below your cuticle and apply at a downward angle to avoid air bubbles. Press down firmly and hold for about 30 seconds.
settings.pro_tips:
• If glue begins to touch the skin, remove asap and start over.
  • For extra staying power, apply a small amount of glue underneath each press on, once it is adhered to the natural nail.
settings.subtitle2: Size and place adhesive on natural nail and remove top layer to expose sticky surface. Apply press on at a downward angle and hold for 30 seconds.
settings.pro_tips2:
• When adhering press on to sticker, apply pressure for 10-20 seconds per nail.
  • This method is for a mani that lasts about 1-2 days.
settings.video_embed2: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/767039512?autoplay=1&loop=1&background=1" width="640" height="573" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

settings.heading: Smooth & Perfect
settings.subtitle: Once all nails are applied, use file to smooth and achieve your desired shape.
settings.pro_tips: • Taking a few extra minutes to smooth and shape your press ons with a file will make a big difference in how natural they look.
settings.subtitle2: Wash hands with soap and water to remove dirt and oil.

settings.intro_text:
HOW TO APPLY #PBPRESSONS LIKE A PRO

We reimagined DIY nail care so that babes across the country could have access to our obsessed-about art while at home. Now, with PB Press Ons, you can add length to your nail art mani in minutes!
settings.heading: How to apply
settings.remove_content:
If you are re-using press ons: Soak nails in warm water for 10 minutes, glue will loosen. Use cuticle stick to gently peel up PB Press Ons. Don't force it - soak a bit longer if they aren't coming up right away!
If you are not re-using press ons: Soak nails in acetone for 5-10 minutes. Use cuticle stick to remove PB Press Ons.
settings.closing_content: Have ‘em wrapped around your finger in minutes.

settings.title: How long do PB Press Ons Last?
settings.answer: Our press ons last anywhere from 10-14 days depending on how much glue is applied and your level of daily activity involving your hands.

settings.title: How do I know what size press on is best for my nails?
settings.answer: You can select your press on size by placing the full sheet of press ons over your nails (with the curved end up towards your cuticle). The right fit will cover your natural nail but will not touch your skin. We suggest using a press on slightly smaller than your nail, then gently stretching it so that it lies completely flat on your nail with no air bubbles or lifting.

settings.title: What if my nail is too small for some of the press ons?
settings.answer: If some nail press ons don't fit your nails perfectly, you should size down and then gently stretch the press on to perfectly fit your nail. We recommend using a press on that is slightly smaller than your nail to avoid the press on touching skin or cuticles. Using a press on that is too large and ultimately touches your skin, will cause lifting at the edges.

settings.title: Are PB press ons safe?
settings.answer: Yes, our nail press ons are SGS and MSDS certified. If you have any allergic reactions to nail polishes do not use this product. Our press ons are safe to use if pregnant and are 7 chemical-free.

settings.title: Are PB Press ons tested on animals?
settings.answer: No animal testing has been performed on our press ons. Our press ons are also leaping bunny certified.

settings.title: How do I remove PB Press Ons?
settings.answer: Our press ons can be easily removed with nail polish remover or oil.

settings.title: Can PB press ons be shipped to Canada or outside of the US?
settings.answer: We do not currently ship to Canada or internationally.
